lines.text: Just teach the class and stop showing off your tits and your tight little ass!
Relax... I'm not some kind of crazy killer.
Tell that college boy that if he doesn't have that report ready in 30 minutes, I'm going to go over there and do an autopsy on his face! You got that?
Valerie Johnson was to become the modelling world's newest young star... But suddenly couldn't get a job starring in a freak show!
